title: Having issues Patching 7.15? Click Here!
body:
Hey everyone,

Welcome to 7.15 folks. Got a ton of technical updates for this patch; military grade weapons from Omega Squad... shot gun knees from Urgot... and even MORE Duskblade!

http://i.imgur.com/JOcVxvt.png

We wanted to come up with a footer for this, but Urgot came out and took all our spare feet. So let's cut to the chase; if you need help patching check out the advice below or post your issue below for the Poro Bros and the rest of Support can help you out one on one!       

------------------------------------------------

>#Is it true you can now bind auto attack to left-click?

Yes!  While** in-game**, select Hotkeys in the options menu and scroll all the way to to bottom.  [Screenshot included.](https://i.imgur.com/aAxGzpC.png)

># New skins where?!

New content like skins slated to release during a patch doesn't necessarily mean it will be on the same day.  Bookmark the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for news and info on new or upcoming content.


>#Why does the End of Game Stats screen take FOREVER to freakin' load?!

This might be due to the "Close Client During Game" option in the client.  This option makes the client close out when you enter a game, which means after the game it has to completely reboot to start.  Low Spec Mode should be enough to keep things running smoothly, so disable this option by entering the client, clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner, [and unchecking the box.](http://i.imgur.com/smwR8be.png)

>#I've  tried the Updated Client before, and it was sooooo laggy

We've made some massive changes to the Updated Client make it run as smoothly as possible, even on the proudest of potatoes.  Enable Low Spec Mode if it isn’t on already.  You can find out by clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner of the Updated Client and then [click "Enable Low Spec Mode"](http://i.imgur.com/rPGRnYW.png)

>#Patching Failed and we're not sure why Error: 004

This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.  [Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

>#Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching Error: 003

Occurs when the patcher isn't able to maintain a stable connection with our Patcher Servers.  If the patcher loses connection to the server to get the necessary files, it will simply stop working.  To get this resolved, [make sure to complete all of the solutions in this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

--------------------------------------

If you have a problem that isn’t here or those solutions aren’t working, drop a comment below and we’ll be sure to respond and help you out!  ^.^

replies.body:
Why is my patch taking forever?

[Screenshot](https://i.gyazo.com/ae492652e140ac8f1b1931fd00d7ce78.png)
Having the same issue.

Regardless of how fast your internet is, your network can still run into instability or outright blocks reaching specific services, like the patching server.  I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities and make sure your connection to the patching service holds steady.

It stucks at 0% for everybody and the game starts for the other players and I'm there forever!
Then after 3 mins, remake..
It happened me 4 times in a row and I've got 5, 20min leaverbuster too.
I don't know what is happening but this patch kills me. 
I tried to relog fast but still 0%.
I tried to reconnect but still 0%.
Help me please! First time this happening to me. :(

(my internet is fine)  (check my match history if you don't believe me)

Even though your internet has been working fine, there's still a chance that your connection wasn't able to reliably communicate with our servers. Make sure to run through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some basic troubleshooting steps, but hit us back up if that doesn't help.

But should I trust in the game now?
Or just another remake and another penalty? :|

Well, I surely don't want you to just keep re-queueing and end up increasing that LPQ timer without first troubleshooting this issue. Make sure to check out the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and test those steps in a custom game first.

Everything is fine with connection guide, now I'm uninstalling the whole game and maybe it
will fix it.

My patch is stuck at 27% and it's eta is over 2 hours long. I have already flushed my dns, reinstalled the game, restarted everything, and it's not working. Please help I just want to play league of legends-dyrus.

Are you still on the legacy client?  Getting stuck this early might actually indicate a security setting that's blocking your game files from prepping an update.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to rule out possibilities and add League as an exception.  Let me know how that works out for you.
I was not on the legacy client. I just waited a long time and it worked

It sounds like your client is being blocked from launching, so nothing happens.  Run through the steps in the #permissions guide to update your security settings and restore access.  Give your PC a restart too just in case anything crashed in the background as well.

This could be due to outdated drivers or something else going on with your pc settings.  To start, make sure your air vents are clear so you're not getting any overheating.  Then check out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your settings!

Even with your connection being fine, it sounds like a network issue is having problems grabbing updates from the patching server.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Also, if you have League saved in an external drive then it's likely your game files are only being saved temporarily and should be stored in your primary internal drive.

As long as you don't see any errors while applying the patch files, it's best to let the client finishing the update process. Let me know if the client sits for an abnormal amount of time, as you may need to try repairing the client.

By the solutions page, I assume you mean the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide. Try out our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well in this case, to help make sure your firewall settings are automatically configured.  Let me know if that helps.

Other computers in the house had no issues like this and updated just fine. Any solutions for this? I've seen quite a few players report downloading additional large files during the update, but I don't have any details beyond potential repairs.  As long as your network is stable while reaching the patching server, you shouldn't run into too many issues.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case to clear up possible instability.
After I finished patching, the client decided i needed to download another 3gb patch. This has happen last patch as well
Your patcher may have detected some bad files, and needed to download some repairs.  Otherwise, it's likely that loading into a game could have caused a crash, which would be pretty stressful!

Did you end up downloading it? Because Im having the same issue

How long have you been patching?  It may just be trying to calibrate your game files and info still.  If it's been a while, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up anything that might be blocking you from reaching the patching server.
The ETA when I started was about 80 min. After it got down to 1 min it started going into the negatives. Now it's at -35 min. So around an hour and a half to two hours.

the patch seems to corrupt my client the download got stuck at 99% and the game doesnt run smoothly like befor it has small delays will try to reinstall. 
fps went from 60 flat to 40-60 waves

It sounds like your connection is unstable, so it's backtracking and failing to download your updates.  This can also cause your game files to corrupt, especially if it gets canceled.  Run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure you're able to reach the patching server.

Then grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a force repatch to make sure your game files are healthy.  I hope that helps!
